lead_paragraph: As President Obama prepares to visit Cuba this month, the lack of trade with the former foe threatens to sap momentum from the process of building relations.

headline.print_headline: Culture Gap Impedes U.S. Business Efforts for Trade With Cuba
headline.main: Culture Gap Impedes U.S. Business Efforts for Trade With Cuba

snippet: As President Obama prepares to visit Cuba this month, the lack of trade with the former foe threatens to sap momentum from the process of building relations.
abstract: American businesses struggle to strike deals in Cuba despite recent diplomatic opening between two countries; Obama administration maintains embargo but loosens restrictions on commerce and increasingly recognizes necessity of dealing directly with Cuban government; vastly different business cultures have also contributed to failure.
